jd: From: Upama, CBS LLC upama@cbsllc.us Reply to: upama@cbsllc.us Teradata Engineer : Irving TX-HybridWork Location: Irving TXOnsite at Irving TX (3 days a week)GC, USC, H4 EAD , OPT EADJob Description:This is for PBM compliance domain, some of their upstream system migrated to BQ and due to funding restrictions, not all applications are going to be in BQ immediately. So this team consumes data from BQ in the form of extract data, sometime, they wanted to access BQ for data check/validation and push data to their Teradata platform. They need someone who has hands on experience on skill set like GCP – BigQuery (60%), Teradata – BTEQ’s (40%), pipeline process, python etc would be good start here. Must Have:Teradata – BTEQ’sGCP – BigQuery Nice To have:Python
